segment.source: Retrieve retail ETW logs
segment.target: Retrieve retail ETW logs

segment.source: Retrieve retail ETW logs
segment.target: Retrieve retail ETW logs

segment.source: Retrieve retail ETW logs
segment.target: Retrieve retail ETW logs

segment.source: You can diagnose a variety of issues by looking at the retail logs.
segment.target: You can diagnose a variety of issues by looking at the retail logs.

segment.source: See Capture event trace logs on Windows 10 Mobile to get more information about processing and viewing retail logs.
segment.target: See Capture event trace logs on Windows 10 Mobile to get more information about processing and viewing retail logs.

segment.source: Retrieving logs from a retail device
segment.target: Retrieving logs from a retail device

segment.source: You need to boot the device in mass-storage mode to retrieve logs from an engineering or retail-unlocked device.
segment.target: You need to boot the device in mass-storage mode to retrieve logs from an engineering or retail-unlocked device.

segment.source: The host PC can detect the device as a storage device when you boot in mass-storage mode.
segment.target: The host PC can detect the device as a storage device when you boot in mass-storage mode.

segment.source: The procedure to do this depends on silicon vendor settings.
segment.target: The procedure to do this depends on silicon vendor settings.

segment.source: This is how to retrieve existing ETW logs from a retail device:
segment.target: This is how to retrieve existing ETW logs from a retail device:

segment.source: Unlock the device.
segment.target: Unlock the device.

segment.source: Press a specific key sequence on the device to start in mass storage mode.
segment.target: Press a specific key sequence on the device to start in mass storage mode.

segment.source: Usually this is done by holding just the camera button, or the camera and the volume down button, while powering up.
segment.target: Usually this is done by holding just the camera button, or the camera and the volume down button, while powering up.

segment.source: The screen will remain blank for about five seconds, and then you’ll see new storage drives in Windows Explorer.
segment.target: The screen will remain blank for about five seconds, and then you’ll see new storage drives in Windows Explorer.

segment.source: Look for the drive where the EFIESP folder is located.
segment.target: Look for the drive where the EFIESP folder is located.

segment.source: In Windows Explorer, copy the files from these two directories.
segment.target: In Windows Explorer, copy the files from these two directories.

segment.source: Depending on the amount of activity on the phone, ETL logs, system dumps in cab files, and other logs will be in this directory.
segment.target: Depending on the amount of activity on the phone, ETL logs, system dumps in cab files, and other logs will be in this directory.

segment.source: After you have copied the logs from the device, close Windows Explorer, and then eject the device.
segment.target: After you have copied the logs from the device, close Windows Explorer, and then eject the device.

segment.target: Related topics
